sources.name: gdelt
sources.query: SELECT GENERATE_UUID() Guid, DateTime, URL, Title, DocTone, Location, Lat, Lon, CountryCode, Adm1Code, GeoType, ContextualText FROM gdelt-bq.gdeltv2.ggg LIMIT 1000

actions.name: BQ_GGG->GGG
actions.description: Xform BQ GGG rows -> GGG nodes

options.cypher: MATCH (row:BQ_GGGRecord) WITH row.URL as GGGsourceUrl, row.Guid as GGGguid, datetime(row.DateTime) as GGGdate, toFloat(head(split(coalesce(toString(row.DocTone), '0.0'), ','))) as GGGaverageTone, row.Location as GeoRefname, row.GeoType as GeoReftype, row.Adm1Code as GeoRefcode, row.ContextualText as GGGtext, row.Title as GGGtitle, row.Lon as Coordinateslongitude, row.Lat as Coordinateslatitude, row.the_geom as Coordinatespoint, row.CountryCode as countryCode MERGE (ggg:GGGRecord {Guid: GGGguid}) SET ggg.date = GGGdate,ggg.averageTone = GGGaverageTone,ggg.title = GGGtitle, ggg.text = GGGtext

actions.name: BQ_GGG2->GGG2
actions.description: Xform BQ GGG2 rows -> GGG2 nodes

options.cypher: MATCH (row:BQ_GGGRecord2) WITH row.URL as GGGsourceUrl, row.Guid as GGGguid, datetime(row.DateTime) as GGGdate, toFloat(head(split(coalesce(toString(row.DocTone), '0.0'), ','))) as GGGaverageTone, row.Location as GeoRefname, row.GeoType as GeoReftype, row.Adm1Code as GeoRefcode, row.ContextualText as GGGtext, row.Title as GGGtitle, row.Lon as Coordinateslongitude, row.Lat as Coordinateslatitude, row.the_geom as Coordinatespoint, row.CountryCode as countryCode MERGE (ggg:GGGRecord2 {Guid: GGGguid}) SET ggg.date = GGGdate,ggg.averageTone = GGGaverageTone,ggg.title = GGGtitle, ggg.text = GGGtext
